line.text: When I do count the clock that tells the time
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And see the brave day sunk in hideous night
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When I behold the violet past prime
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And sable curls all silvered oer with white
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When lofty trees I see barren of leaves
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which erst from heat did canopy the herd
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And summer green all girded up in sheaves
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Borne on the bier with white and bristly beard
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then of thy beauty do I question make
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That thou among the wastes of time must go
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Since sweets and beauties do themselves forsake
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And die as fast as they see others grow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And nothing gainst Time scythe can make defence
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Save breed to brave him when he takes thee hence
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
